languages.text: На высохшей руке трупа блестит предмет: серебряные четки со смутно знакомым вам Имперским символом.
A glittering object on the corpse's hand catches your eye: a string of silver prayer beads with a vaguely familiar Imperium symbol.
languages.original_text: На высохшей руке трупа блестит предмет: серебряные четки со смутно знакомым вам Имперским символом.

traits.locale_text: A glittering object on the corpse's hand catches your eye: a string of silver prayer beads with a vaguely familiar Imperium symbol.
A glittering object on the corpse's hand catches your eye: a string of silver prayer beads with a vaguely familiar Imperium symbol.
A glittering object on the corpse's hand catches your eye: a string of silver prayer beads with a vaguely familiar Imperial symbol.
A glittering object on the corpse's hand catches your eye: a string of silver prayer beads with a vaguely familiar Imperial symbol.
A glittering object on the corpse's hand catches your eye: a string of silver prayer beads with a vaguely familiar Imperium symbol.
A glittering object on the corpse's hand catches your eye: a string of silver prayer beads with a vaguely familiar Imperium symbol.

languages.text: Te llama la atención un objeto reluciente en la mano del cadáver: un rosario de plata con un símbolo del Imperium vagamente familiar.
languages.original_text: A glittering object on the corpse's hand catches your eye: a string of silver prayer beads with a vaguely familiar Imperium symbol.

traits.locale_text: Te llama la atención un objeto reluciente en la mano del cadáver: un rosario de plata con un símbolo del Imperium vagamente familiar.

languages.text: 尸体手上某个闪闪发光的东西引起了你的注意。那是一串银色念珠，上面隐约刻着某个你熟悉的帝国符号。
languages.original_text: A glittering object on the corpse's hand catches your eye: a string of silver prayer beads with a vaguely familiar Imperium symbol.

traits.locale_text: 尸体手上某个闪闪发光的东西引起了你的注意。那是一串银色念珠，上面隐约刻着某个你熟悉的帝国符号。

languages.text: 死体の手の上に輝くものに目を引かれる。それは馴染みのある帝国の記章がぼんやりと付いている銀の数珠である。
languages.original_text: A glittering object on the corpse's hand catches your eye: a string of silver prayer beads with a vaguely familiar Imperium symbol.

traits.locale_text: 死体の手の上に輝くものに目を引かれる。それは馴染みのある帝国の記章がぼんやりと付いている銀の数珠である。

languages.text: Ein funkelnder Gegenstand in der Hand des Leichnams erregt deine Aufmerksamkeit: eine Kette aus silbernen Gebetsperlen mit einem vage vertrauten Symbol des Imperiums.
languages.original_text: A glittering object on the corpse's hand catches your eye: a string of silver prayer beads with a vaguely familiar Imperium symbol.

traits.locale_text: Ein funkelnder Gegenstand in der Hand des Leichnams erregt deine Aufmerksamkeit: eine Kette aus silbernen Gebetsperlen mit einem vage vertrauten Symbol des Imperiums.

languages.text: Un objet brillant sur la main du cadavre attire votre regard : un chapelet d'argent portant un symbole de l'Imperium qui vous est vaguement familier.
languages.original_text: A glittering object on the corpse's hand catches your eye: a string of silver prayer beads with a vaguely familiar Imperium symbol.

traits.locale_text: Un objet brillant sur la main du cadavre attire votre regard : un chapelet d'argent portant un symbole de l'Imperium qui vous est vaguement familier.

languages.text: Cesedin elindeki ışıltılı nesne, gözüne çarpıyor. Üzerinde tam çıkaramadığın bir İmparatorluk sembolü olan, gümüş bir tespih bu.
languages.original_text: A glittering object on the corpse's hand catches your eye: a string of silver prayer beads with a vaguely familiar Imperium symbol.

traits.locale_text: Cesedin elindeki ışıltılı nesne, gözüne çarpıyor. Üzerinde tam çıkaramadığın bir İmparatorluk sembolü olan, gümüş bir tespih bu.
